name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Principal Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess robust skills in **Go**, **TypeScript**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis**, complemented by a strong understanding of algorithms, data structures, and graph algorithms. I specialize in building high-performance backend solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing my expertise in full-stack development including **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**. My cloud strategy includes extensive experience with **AWS** and **Azure**, enhancing the scalability and reliability of enterprise-grade platforms.

I have led the development of complex systems integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation, ensuring alignment with compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems allows me to craft robust applications, while my proficiency in CI/CD automation furthers operational efficiency. Additionally, my hands-on experience in machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows is backed by the use of tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
